channel.title: plant immunity on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in plant immunity on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaHsfB2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA03g16300 Gene Symbol: CaHsfB2a Gene Name: Genome: Pepper.

item.title: CaLecRK-S.5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA04g04250 Gene Symbol: CaLecRK-S.5 Gene Name: lectin receptor kinase Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaLecRK-S.

item.title: CaPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000105 Gene Symbol: CaPUB21 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 21 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaPUB21 acted positively in immunity at 28 °C but negatively at 37 °C.

item.title: CsACD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs1g22670 Gene Symbol: CsACD2 Gene Name: Genome: Citrus sinensis Valencia genome v1.

item.title: GhTINY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GhD06G0642 Gene Symbol: GhTINY2 Gene Name: Genome: Cotton Functional Genomics Database Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Orchestration of plant development and defense by indirect crosstalk of salicylic acid and brassinosteorid signaling via transcription factor GhTINY2.

item.title: GmBIR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G079200 Gene Symbol: GmBIR1 Gene Name: BAK1-INTERACTING RECEPTOR LIKE KINASE1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean immune receptor GmBIR1 regulates host transcriptome, spliceome, and immunity during cyst nematode infection.

item.title: GmCAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.14G223500 Gene Symbol: GmCAT1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: GmDPB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G228100 Gene Symbol: GmDPB Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Upon binding to GmDPB, PsAvh113 decreased the transcription of the downstream gene GmCAT1, which acts as a positive regulator of plant immunity.

item.title: MeHSP90.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me18G012200 Gene Symbol: MeHSP90.9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: This study highlights the dual regulation of SA and auxin biosynthesis by MeHSP90.

item.title: MeNR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S077300.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR1 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 1 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: MeNR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S076800.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR2 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 2 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: MeRAV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.06G036900 Gene Symbol: MeRAV5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The dual interplay of RAV5 (MeRAV5) in activating nitrate reductases and repressing catalase activity to improve disease resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeRAV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.06G036900 Gene Symbol: MeRAV5 Gene Name: Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: NbPIP2;4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbPIP2;4 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Description: this study elucidates a conserved and novel pathway caused by GP1pro to initiate host cellular defences by targeting the plant aquaporin protein NbPIP2;4 and transporting apoplast-to-cytoplast H2O2 to regulate plant immunity.

item.title: NtRHO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtRHO1 Gene Name: Rho-type GTPase 1 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: The small GTPase NtRHO1 negatively regulates tobacco defense response to tobacco mosaic virus by interacting with NtWRKY50.

item.title: OsGMT1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g49150 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0705000 Gene Symbol: OsGMT1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: SlDMR6-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g080190.3 Gene Symbol: SlDMR6-1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlNRC4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc04g007070 Gene Symbol: SlNRC4a Gene Name: nucleotide-binding leucine-rich repeat receptor 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The intracellular nucleotide-binding leucine-rich repeat receptor (SlNRC4a) enhances immune signalling elicited by extracellular perception.

item.title: StCBL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.06G013800.1 Gene Symbol: StCBL3 Gene Name: Calcineurin B-Like protein 3 Genome: Spud DB (http://spuddb.

item.title: StIPP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400016891 Gene Symbol: StIPP Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Description: In Arabidopsis protoplasts, expression of StIPP resulted in the stabilization of the PAMP receptor, FLAGELLIN-SENSITIVE 2, indicating that StIPP may act as a PAMP-induced and localized antagonist of PtdIns(4,5)P2-dependent processes during plant immunity.

item.title: StLRPK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLRPK1 Gene Name: LRR receptor-like kinase 1 Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: A potato STRUBBELIG-RECEPTOR FAMILY member, StLRPK1, associates with StSERK3A/BAK1 and activates immunity.

item.title: StMKK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sotub12g010200.1.1 Gene Symbol: StMKK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Found that StMKK1 negatively regulated potato resistance to the hemibiotrophic/biotrophic pathogens P.

item.title: StPIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: PGSC0003DMG400014879 Gene Symbol: StPIP1 Gene Name: Genome: Spud DB (http://solanaceae.

item.title: StUBA2a/b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.01G005860.9 Gene Symbol: StUBA2a/b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMPK7 phosphorylates and stabilizes a potato RNA-binding protein StUBA2a/b to enhance plant defence responses.

item.title: TaADF4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaADF4 Gene Name: actin-depolymerizing factor 4 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaADF4, an actin-depolymerizing factor from wheat, is required for resistance to the stripe rust pathogen Puccinia striiformis f.

item.title: TaCPK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2D02G229100.1 Gene Symbol: TaCPK5 Gene Name: Ca2+-dependent protein kinase 5 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaTHI2 interacts with Ca2+-dependent protein kinase TaCPK5 to suppress virus infection by regulating ROS accumulation.

item.title: TaGAPDH2-2A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2A02G344600.1 Gene Symbol: TaGAPDH2-2A Gene Name: glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase 2 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaGAPDH2-2B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B02G342200.1 Gene Symbol: TaGAPDH2-2B Gene Name: glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase 2 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaGAPDH2-2D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCs2D02G322900.1 Gene Symbol: TaGAPDH2-2D Gene Name: glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase 2 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaSTT3b-2B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS2B02G587900 Gene Symbol: TaSTT3b-2B Gene Name: STAUROSPORINE AND TEMPERATURE SENSITIVE3 Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: TaTHI2-7A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7A02G376800.1 Gene Symbol: TaTHI2-7A Gene Name: thiamine thiazole synthase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaTHI2 interacts with Ca2+-dependent protein kinase TaCPK5 to suppress virus infection by regulating ROS accumulation.

item.title: TaTHI2-7B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7B02G278200.1 Gene Symbol: TaTHI2-7B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaTHI2 interacts with Ca2+-dependent protein kinase TaCPK5 to suppress virus infection by regulating ROS accumulation.

item.title: TaTHI2-7D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS7D02G373100.2 Gene Symbol: TaTHI2-7D Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: TaTHI2 interacts with Ca2+-dependent protein kinase TaCPK5 to suppress virus infection by regulating ROS accumulation.

item.title: VvRHIP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_06s0004g00100 Gene Symbol: VvRHIP1 Gene Name: RGS1-HXK1-interacting protein 1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: The woody plant-degrading pathogen Lasiodiplodia theobromae effector LtCre1 targets the grapevine sugar-signaling protein VvRHIP1 to suppress host immunity.
